attributes.action: dyspraxia / Dyslexia  assessments and Doctor training
attributes.additional_details:
I urge the NHS to increase the awareness of Dyspraxia across the NHS; include training for every doctor so they know where to refer adults for assessment and diagnosis.

Ensure every county has a dedicated dyspraxia service for adults who can diagnose this condition.

Fund dyslexic assessments for adults who are not in education.
